class.name: warrior
class.description: A well rounded fighter with high strength and defence.
class.abilityDescription: Can duel wield one handed weapons effectively.

class.name: knight
class.description: A low ranking knight with high strength and defence at the cost of a little speed.
class.abilityDescription: Can duel wield both one handed and two handed weapons.

class.name: assassin
class.description: A fast, agile assassin with high luck and low defence.
class.abilityDescription: 2% chance to parry physical attacks in battle (take no damage and deal a critical hit next turn) (+0.1%/character level, +0.05%/luck level > 9).

class.name: hunter
class.description: A skilled, dexterous hunter with high speed.
class.abilityDescription: 5% chance to fire two arrows and 5% chance to make enemies slower than the hunter in battle (+0.5%/character level, +0.25%/speed level > 11).

class.name: mage
class.description: An apprentice mage equipped with advanced magic capabilites.
class.abilityDescription: Damage taken from magic attacks is reduced by 10% everywhere (+0.5%/character level).

class.name: thief
class.description: A cunning thief with high speed and luck.
class.abilityDescription: Lose 50% less gold from losing battles. Gain 10% extra gold from winning battles (+0.5%/character level, +0.25%/luck level > 9).

class.name: deprived
class.description: A skilled scavanger who is clueless about magic.
class.abilityDescription: Start the game at a higher level.
